channel.title: Tickets on Kayzor Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Tickets on Kayzor Documentation

item.title: List Tickets
item.description: 4.1 List tickets System display all users in table. Each ticket in table has parametres below: ID (ticket ID generated by system) Date (date when it was placed in format yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm) Username (user’s username) Odd (total odd in ticket) Amount (amount of money which was staked with currency) Return (Potential winning amount with currency) Type (single or multi ticket) Status (current ticket status: lost, pending, cancelled or won)

item.title: Search Tickets
item.description: 4.2 Search tickets System has tools to search for user with certain parameters. First is one search field which search all parameters in table. Second appears when you press Advanced button near first search. Once user press that button below appears search fields below: ID (input) Date (date range with calendar) Username (input, autocomplete) Odd (rage in numbers) Amount (range in numbers, must select currency) Currency (dropbox) Return (range in numbers, must select currency) Type (dropbox) Status (dropbox)

item.title: Ticket Inside Information
item.description: 4.3 Ticket inside information Profile System displays general ticket details. Parameters: ID (ticket ID generated by system) Date (date when it was placed in format yyyy/mm/dd hh:mm) Username (user’s username) Odd (total odd in ticket) Amount (amount of money which was staked with currency) Return (Potential winning amount with currency) Type (single or multi ticket) Status (current ticket status: lost, pending, cancelled or won) Bets System display ticket’s bets. Parameters:

item.title: Cancel Ticket
item.description: 4.4 Cancel ticket System allows to cancel ticket. It means that all bet’s odds from ticket becomes 1 and system return stake to user’s account.
